text: Delegation were a British R&B; and soul group. Their songs included "Oh Honey". They were active from 1975 until 1999. "Oh Honey" was sampled by a lot of musicians in the 1980s and 1990s. Category:R&B; bands Category:British pop music groups Category:1999 disestablishments in Europe Category:Musical groups established in 1975 Category:1975 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1999 Category:1990s disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:1999 in the United Kingdom
title: Delegation (band)
